Shopee Malaysia is a leading online shopping site based in Malaysia that brings you great deals, with platforms existing across Asia including Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, Philippines, and Taiwan.
Lelong.my is the pioneer of online auction, the best and largest marketplace in Malaysia; a one stop place where people can buy, bid, learn and sell online!
Lazada Malaysia is a Rocket Internet Venture and an affiliate of Easytaxi, FoodPanda, PricePanda, Wimdu, Lamido and Zalora. Great Prices, Even Better Service!
11street is an open marketplace operated by Celcom Planet Sdn. Bhd. – a joint venture between Celcom Axiata Bhd. and SK Planet Ltd.
Recent years, we had expanded our business network to several Malaysia\'s leading online marketplace and have our products listed online. Visit our online store and start purchase from us now!
Unless otherwise specify, purchase of any product with stated warranty information shall follow below policy :

As long as the product is stated covered by warranty (either local manufacturer warranty or special store warranty), we will cover full year warranty as long as the warranty claim is within the warranty period (shipping charge applies).
Warranty period is based on the receipt date, or the date stated on warranty sticker on the product.
